test.name: webdav.get
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("webdav.get", labkey.webdav.get(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/readChecks/getMe.txt", localFilePath="%downloadDir%/getMe.txt", overwrite=FALSE)) c("file.exists", file.exists("%downloadDir%/getMe.txt")) c("file.info.isdir", file.info("%downloadDir%/getMe.txt")$isdir)

test.name: webdav.get overwrite=TRUE
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("file.create", file.create("%downloadDir%/overwriteMe.txt")) c("initial size", file.info("%downloadDir%/overwriteMe.txt")$size) c("webdav.get", labkey.webdav.get(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/readChecks/getMe.txt", localFilePath="%downloadDir%/overwriteMe.txt", overwrite=TRUE)) c("final size", file.info("%downloadDir%/overwriteMe.txt")$size)

test.name: webdav.get overwrite=FALSE
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("file.create", file.create("%downloadDir%/dontOverwriteMe.txt")) c("initial size", file.info("%downloadDir%/dontOverwriteMe.txt")$size) c("webdav.get", labkey.webdav.get(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/readChecks/getMe.txt", localFilePath="%downloadDir%/dontOverwriteMe.txt", overwrite=FALSE)) c("final size", file.info("%downloadDir%/dontOverwriteMe.txt")$size)

test.name: webdav.get overwrite directory with file
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("dir.create", dir.create("%downloadDir%/overwriteDir")) c("webdav.get", tryCatch({labkey.webdav.get(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/readChecks/getMe.txt", localFilePath="%downloadDir%/overwriteDir", overwrite=TRUE)}, error = function(e) {e$message})) c("file.exists", file.exists("%downloadDir%/overwriteDir")) c("file.info.isdir", file.info("%downloadDir%/overwriteDir")$isdir)
test.response: [1] "dir.create" "TRUE" The local filepath exists and is a directory [1] "file.exists" "TRUE" [1] "file.info.isdir" "TRUE"

test.name: webdav.get directory
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("webdav.get", tryCatch({labkey.webdav.get(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/readChecks/getMe", localFilePath="%downloadDir%/getMe_download", overwrite=FALSE)}, error = function(e) {e$message})) c("file.exists", file.exists("%downloadDir%/getMe_download"))
test.response: The requested file is a directory [1] "file.exists" "FALSE"

test.name: webdav.get missing file
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("file.exists pre", file.exists("%downloadDir%/noexist.txt")) c("webdav.get", tryCatch({labkey.webdav.get(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/readChecks/noexist.txt", localFilePath="%downloadDir%/noexist.txt", overwrite=TRUE)}, error = function(e) {e$message})) c("file.exists post", file.exists("%downloadDir%/noexist.txt"))

test.name: webdav.mkDir
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("remote file.exists pre", file.exists("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/mkDir")) c("webdav.mkDir", labkey.webdav.mkDir(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/writeChecks/mkDir")) c("remote file.exists post", file.exists("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/mkDir")) c("remote file.info.isdir", file.info("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/mkDir")$isdir)

test.name: webdav.mkDir fail too deep
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("webdav.mkDir", tryCatch({labkey.webdav.mkDir(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/writeChecks/mkDirFail/subdir")}, error = function(e) {e$message})) c("remote file.exists", file.exists("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/mkDirFail"))

test.name: webdav.mkDirs depth 1
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("file.exists pre", file.exists("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/mkDirs1")) c("webdav.mkDirs", labkey.webdav.mkDirs(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/writeChecks/mkDirs1/subdir")) c("file.exists post", file.exists("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/mkDirs1/subdir")) c("file.info.isdir", file.info("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/mkDirs1/subdir")$isdir)

test.name: webdav.mkDirs depth 2
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("file.exists pre", file.exists("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/mkDirs2")) c("webdav.mkDirs", labkey.webdav.mkDirs(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/writeChecks/mkDirs2/subdir/subdir2")) c("file.exists post", file.exists("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/mkDirs2/subdir/subdir2")) c("file.info.isdir", file.info("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/mkDirs2/subdir/subdir2")$isdir)

test.name: webdav.put
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("remote file.exists pre", file.exists("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/putMe.txt")) c("webdav.put", labkey.webdav.put(localFile="%remoteDir%/readChecks/getMe.txt", baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/writeChecks/putMe.txt")) c("remote file.exists post", file.exists("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/putMe.txt")) c("remote file.info.size", file.info("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/putMe.txt")$size)

test.name: webdav.pathExists=TRUE
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("webdav.pathExists", labkey.webdav.pathExists(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/readChecks/getMe.txt"))

test.name: webdav.pathExists=FALSE
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("webdav.pathExists", labkey.webdav.pathExists(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/readChecks/putMe.txt"))

test.name: webdav.listDir
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("webdav.listDir.fileCount", labkey.webdav.listDir(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/readChecks")$fileCount)

test.name: webdav.listDir file
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("webdav.listDir", labkey.webdav.listDir(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/readChecks/getMe.txt"))

test.name: webdav.listDir noexist
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("webdav.listDir", tryCatch({labkey.webdav.listDir(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/readChecks/noexist")}, error = function(e) {e$message}))

test.name: webdav.delete
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("remote file.exists pre", file.exists("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/deleteMe.txt")) c("webdav.delete", labkey.webdav.delete(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/writeChecks/deleteMe.txt")) c("remote file.exists post", file.exists("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/deleteMe.txt"))

test.name: webdav.delete empty directory
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("remote dir.exists pre", dir.exists("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/deleteMe_empty")) c("webdav.delete", labkey.webdav.delete(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/writeChecks/deleteMe_empty")) c("remote file.exists post", file.exists("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/deleteMe_empty"))

test.name: webdav.delete directory
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("remote dir.exists pre", dir.exists("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/deleteMe")) c("webdav.delete", labkey.webdav.delete(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/writeChecks/deleteMe")) c("remote file.exists post", file.exists("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/deleteMe"))

test.name: webdav.delete noexist
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("remote file.exists pre", file.exists("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/noexist.txt")) c("webdav.delete", tryCatch({labkey.webdav.delete(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/writeChecks/noexist.txt")}, error = function(e) {e$message})) c("remote file.exists post", file.exists("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/noexist.txt"))
test.response: [1] "remote file.exists pre" "FALSE" [1] "webdav.delete" Status code = 404 [1] "remote file.exists post" "FALSE"

test.name: webdav.downloadFolder
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("file.exists pre", file.exists("%downloadDir%/getMe")) c("webdav.downloadFolder", labkey.webdav.downloadFolder(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/readChecks/getMe", localDir="%downloadDir%", overwrite=FALSE)) c("dir.exists post", dir.exists("%downloadDir%/getMe")) c("file.info.size a", file.info("%downloadDir%/getMe/a.txt")$size) c("file.info.size b", file.info("%downloadDir%/getMe/subdir/b.txt")$size) c("empty dir.exists", dir.exists("%downloadDir%/getMe/empty_subdir"))

test.name: webdav.downloadFolder overwrite=TRUE
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("dir.create", dir.create("%downloadDir%/overwrite/getMe", recursive=TRUE)) c("webdav.downloadFolder", labkey.webdav.downloadFolder(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/readChecks/getMe", localDir="%downloadDir%/overwrite", overwrite=TRUE)) c("dir.exists post", dir.exists("%downloadDir%/overwrite/getMe")) c("file.info.size a", file.info("%downloadDir%/overwrite/getMe/a.txt")$size) c("file.info.size b", file.info("%downloadDir%/overwrite/getMe/subdir/b.txt")$size) c("empty dir.exists", dir.exists("%downloadDir%/overwrite/getMe/empty_subdir"))

test.name: webdav.downloadFolder overwrite=FALSE
test.url: library(Rlabkey) c("dir.create", dir.create("%downloadDir%/noOverwrite/getMe", recursive=TRUE)) c("webdav.downloadFolder", labkey.webdav.downloadFolder(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath="remote/readChecks/getMe", localDir="%downloadDir%/noOverwrite", overwrite=FALSE)) c("dir.exists post", dir.exists("%downloadDir%/noOverwrite/getMe")) c("file.exists post", file.exists("%downloadDir%/noOverwrite/getMe/a.txt"))

test.name: create directory with tricky characters
test.url: library(Rlabkey) dirName <- "TestDir-a%b#c&d@e~2" #Add tricky characters c("remote file.exists pre", file.exists(paste0("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/", dirName))) c("webdav.mkDir", labkey.webdav.mkDir(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", remoteFilePath=paste0("remote/writeChecks/", dirName))) c("remote file.exists post", file.exists(paste0("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/", dirName))) c("remote file.info.isdir", file.info(paste0("%remoteDir%/writeChecks/", dirName))$isdir)
